description:
Hammond reads like he looks of Asian descent, but he is actually quite a mix, including Hispanic and Native American. He is often asked about his heritage and his response usually is, "Guess!" I shot for Japanese, but I guess I missed the mark.
Whatever his genetic stew, he is beautiful and handsome. His hair is impressive, and it is like a second character in this video.
One of his High School acquaintances submitted Hammond to me. This person is always on the look out for models for various sites, and when he saw him recently, he got the nerve to approach him. Since Hammond had done mainstream photography, he was willing to give porn a shot.
I think his friend from High School had a crush on him back in the day, and I am sure he is going to be first to sign-up to see him stroke his meat.
It was such a treat to see natural pubes on him. They really are beautiful and make a bold statement on his smooth body. His cock is likely way over 6-inches, often looking nearly 7. I really needed to get my tape measure out when he was at full mast.
He has a fun, frisky, amiable attitude, and gives a very energetic and sensual jerk-off video for us. When he cums, it is intense and sensual.
Not sure I have convinced him to do an oral video, so this might be all we get to see of him, but ya never know!
If you are bored by solos, don't skip this one. It has a something extra that is hard to define!
title: Hammond - Solo
